definition: dead end/(fig.) the road to disaster
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind
surname Lu
(idiom) dead end/road to ruin
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction

sentences.english: This is a one-way ticket to hell.
sentences.chinese: 這是一條有去無回的死路。

sentences.english: I don't want to dice with death by pissing off this guy.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想招惹這哥們兒，自尋死路。

sentences.english: Our receipt of the proposal was a bombshell .
sentences.chinese: 我們如接受其建議，無疑是自尋死路。

sentences.english: We're coming to the end of the road.
Capitalism is a dead end;there is no future for it.
sentences.chinese: 資本主義是死路一條，那裏根本沒有未來可言。

sentences.english: Companies that do not belong to a community of discourse will die.
sentences.chinese: 企業若不能參與到尚存論說的羣體中，只有死路一條。

sentences.english: Because of the economic times in buyer's market, not sale has blind lane only.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在買方市場的經濟時代，不營銷只有死路一條。

sentences.english: Desire is death, which physic did except.
sentences.chinese: 醫藥的慾望，我知道，是條死路。

sentences.english: In the course of business, want to open their own vision and not go blind alley .
sentences.chinese: 在創業過程中，要打開自己的視野，不能走死路。

sentences.english: You're hungry, thirsty and eventually you'll die.
sentences.chinese: 你又飢又渴，最終死路一條。

sentences.english: I'll seek you out, flay you alive. One more word and you won't survive.
sentences.chinese: 我要找到你，生吞活剝，總而言之死路一條。

sentences.english: Rule number one: Trial is war, second place is death.
sentences.chinese: 法庭即戰場，輸家死路一條。

sentences.english: It may have been sending mosquitos after a fly swatter, but they had the balls to confront China.
sentences.chinese: 也許是在自找死路，但是至少他們有面對中國的本事。

sentences.english: North and south home and said blue revolting, rice said that is a dead end.
sentences.chinese: 南北迴家和米藍說鬧革命，米藍說那是死路一條。

sentences.english: If you still follow the original mode of development, and ultimately a blind alley.
sentences.chinese: 如果依然按照原有的模式發展，最終仍是一條死路。

sentences.english: Not only is it social suicide, it's mean.
sentences.chinese: 這不止是在社交上自尋死路，還很卑鄙。

definition: a way to make a living/a way to survive/a way out of a predicament
nowhere to go/at the end of one's tether
(idiom) dead end/road to ruin
hopeless situation/deadlock
labor/physical work
through road/way out/way to survive/means of subsistence
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
side road/byway
the road back to where one came from
this road is blocked/fig. This method does not work./Doing this is no good.
a way out/a way to retreat/leeway
to court disaster (idiom)/to dig one's own grave
to attempt suicide/to court death
escape route/retreat route/communication lines to the rear/alternative course of action/room for maneuver
fork in the road
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
see 邪道[xie2 dao4]
